item.title: KVUE
item.description: score:30 Chances: Kenvue becomes a fully independent company following its separation from Johnson & Johnson. Kenvue’s strong second-quarter results and upbeat annual profit forecast suggest positive momentum. Kenvue initiates a quarterly cash dividend, indicating potential returns for investors. Kenvue debuts with strong results in its second quarter since going public.
